name: Raff the Tricker
description:
A game for CiGA GameJam 2022

Made in 48 hours.

More like a showcase of an idea. Not finished yet, so don't expect too much... ;)

Control

Arrow keys: Move;

Z: Use the power to hide yourself from enemies;

X: Take a break for one turn.

Credits

Code | Art | Music | SFX

Fred Fucks

TIC-80 Fantasy Console

Vadim Grigoruk @nesboxcom
